      • test_authorize_code

        public void test_authorize_code()
                         throws Exception
        Request:
        • URL: "/oauth/authorize"
        • Method: GET
        • Header: Authorization = "Basic " + base64 encoded "username:password"
        • Parameter: "client_id"
        • Parameter: "response_type" = "code"
        • Parameter: "scope" = "read"
        • Parameter: "redirect_uri"
        Response: values in URL query:
        • Parameter: "code"
        Throws:
        Exception
        See Also:
        AuthorizationEndpoint

      • test_authorize_token

        public void test_authorize_token()
                          throws Exception
        Use "token" response type, who requires grant type "implicit". Request:
        • URL: "/oauth/authorize"
        • Method: GET
        • Header: Authorization = "Basic " + base64 encoded "username:password"
        • Parameter: "client_id"
        • Parameter: "response_type" = "token"
        • Parameter: "scope" = "read"
        • Parameter: "redirect_uri"
        Response: values in URL fragment:
        • Parameter: "access_token"
        • Parameter: "token_type" = "bearer"
        • Parameter: "expires_in"
        Throws:
        Exception
        See Also:
        AuthorizationEndpoint

      • test_oauthToken

        public void test_oauthToken()
                     throws Exception
        Request:
        • URL: "/oauth/token"
        • Method: POST
        • Header: Authorization = "Basic " + base64 encoded "clientId:clientSecret"
        • Parameter: "grant_type" = "password"
        • Parameter: "username"
        • Parameter: "password"
        Response: JSON with values:
        • Value: "access_token"
        • Value: "token_type" = "bearer"
        • Value: "refresh_token" if grant type "refresh_token"
        • Value: "expires_in"
        • Value: "scope" = "read"
        Throws:
        Exception
        See Also:
        TokenEndpoint
